noun.description: A member of an indigenous people formerly living in southern Manitoba, but now living in Montana, Alberta, and Saskatchewan.
The Siouan language of the Assiniboin.

adjective.description: Relating to the Assiniboin or their language.

origin: Late 17th century: from Canadian French, from Ojibwa assini:pwa:n stone Sioux, from assin stone + pwa:n Sioux.
